commit.message:
intrinsic.texi: Update OpenMP section for OMPv3.

2008-10-28  Tobias Burnus  <burnus@net-b.de>

        * intrinsic.texi: Update OpenMP section for OMPv3.

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@
